name: Feather
description: Feather is a serene game about exploration and immersion in a beautiful landscape. Become a bird, fly around and lose yourself in zen-like flow whilst listening to the soothing ambient soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 64-bit Processor: 2.8GHz CPU Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 860 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 64-bit Processor: 3.2GHz CPU Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 960 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
